rows.label: bf03420100_0010
rows.name: Old man! What happened?

rows.label: bf03420100_0020
rows.name:
Ion... She's gone!
It must've been...them!

rows.label: bf03420100_0030
rows.name: Who's "them"?

rows.label: bf03420100_0040
rows.name:
Metsu, after you went[ML:Dash ]
 some other guy paid me a visit.

rows.label: bf03420100_0050
rows.name: Metsu was here?

rows.label: bf03420100_0060
rows.name: Who was the other guy?

rows.label: bf03420100_0070
rows.name:
Didn't catch his name.
But he had red glasses.

rows.label: bf03420100_0080
rows.name:
That's Yoshitsune!
But what would he want with Ion?

rows.label: bf03420100_0090
rows.name:
Wait!
Nia! Where's Homura?

rows.label: bf03420100_0100
rows.name: Sh-she wasn't there when I woke up...

rows.label: bf03420100_0110
rows.name: What? No one's seen her?

rows.label: bf03420100_0120
rows.name:
Homura... Maybe she realized what was
going on with Ion?

rows.label: bf03420100_0130
rows.name:
Well, knowing those two...
It's not unthinkable.

rows.label: bf03420100_0140
rows.name:
That girl!
Trying to save her on her own?

rows.label: bf03420100_0150
rows.name:
Where's she gone?
Didn't she leave a note?

rows.label: bf03420100_0160
rows.name: No. I'd have noticed!

rows.label: bf03420100_0170
rows.name:
I know where...
I think it could be Karam Ruins.

rows.label: bf03420100_0180
rows.name: Karam Ruins?

rows.label: bf03420100_0190
rows.name:
It's where Adel led his army of resistance from.
Five hundred years ago.

rows.label: bf03420100_0200
rows.name: It's the place where the Holy Grail woke up, too.

rows.label: bf03420100_0210
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] !

rows.label: bf03420100_0220
rows.name:
It must be that Metsu is trying to lure her down
there! I'm sure of it!

rows.label: bf03420100_0230
rows.name:
Cole-san!
Tell us how to get there!

rows.label: bf03420100_0240
rows.name: It's at the top of the Great Stairway.

rows.label: bf03420100_0250
rows.name: Vandham-san!

rows.label: bf03420100_0260
rows.name:
Hey! Old man!
Take care of this old man for us.

rows.label: bf03420100_0270
rows.name: Y-yes!

rows.label: bf03420100_0280
rows.name:
Let's move!
If we go now, maybe we can catch up to her!
